price: Il possède les clefs [des trésors] des cieux et de la terre. Il attribue Ses dons avec largesse, ou les restreint à qui Il veut. Certes, Il est Omniscient.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahu maqālīdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru innahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
